name: RecipeGenerator
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: generate a recipe
des: Ever struggle to find originality while cooking? Well, this skill is the solution. It dynamically generates full recipes by combining a set of random ingredients. While admittedly, not all recipes show great promise, with a little modification, they can provide a base for a completely new dish.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
